welcome_benefits: Earn 6,000 Reward Points on making the first transaction worth ₹1,000.

Movie & Dining: BOGO offer on movie tickets via BookMyShow
Rewards Rate: 10% cashback up to ₹750 at Patanjali stores both online and offline; 1 RP for every ₹100 spent on online and offline spends
Reward Redemption: RP can be redeemed at RBL Rewards
Domestic Lounge Access: 4 complimentary domestic airport lounge access annually

fees_charges.Fuel Surcharge: 1% fuel surcharge waiver up to ₹200 on transactions between ₹500 to ₹4,000
fees_charges.Cash Advance Charges: 2.5% of the Cash Amount or a Minimum of ₹500

product_details: Patanjali RBL Swarn Credit Card can be linked on UPI
10% cashback on Patanjali stores both online and offline on a minimum purchase of ₹500.
BOGO offers on movie tickets up to ₹200 via BookMyShow once every month only on the weekends.
1,500 Patanjali vouchers on annual spends of ₹3 lakhs in the previous year, with ₹12,000 spent on Patanjali website or at stores.
Complimentary domestic airport lounge access once every quarter on spending ₹50,000 in the previous quarter.
